game.name: Agent USA
game.author: Tom Snyder / Scholastic
game.description: This is an educational game designed to teach US State Capitals. It is focused around a mutant television set, called the "Fuzzbomb" which infects United States cities. Agent USA can defeat the Fuzzbomb by growing energy crystals, and travels the United States via train, encoutering "fuzzed cities" along the way. Beware the mutant inhabitants, which take the Agent's crystals.

game.name: Alcazar
game.author: Tom Loughry / Activision
game.description: In this adventure game you control an explorer who's on his way to fortress Alcazar. To reach Alcazar you are travelling through a countryside of fortresses and you need to collect several items that you can find along the way. Once you enter the Alcazar fortress you have to search for the crown.

game.name: Alien Ambush
game.author: Micro D / DANA
game.description: A rather simple, yet original, vertical space shooter. You control a small space fighter tasked with extermination of hordes of alien spaceships. At first, different slow moving motherships attack you in four separate waves. When hit they release two smaller but much faster moving shuttles. To progress to the next attack wave the player must shoot down both the mothership and the two shuttles capsules while evading getting hit by either.

game.name: Alien Typhoon
game.author: Star Craft
game.description: Alien Typhoon is a clone of the arcade game Galaxian. It is a shoot-'em-up where a formation of alien ships attack your lone starship at the bottom of the screen. The aliens peel off from the formation and attack you in different patterns, depending on the color of the ship. The two ships at the top are the motherships and they bring an escort of two red aliens with them to guard them, but if you can shoot the escort and then the mothership, you'll score lots of points.

game.name: Apple Panic
game.author: Olaf Lubeck / Broderbund
game.description: You control a digger, armed with his shovel, and you must kill your opponents - the evil legged apples. Your character can only walk left/right and climb up/down the ladders - no jumping - and if the apples touch you, you'll lose. To kill an apple you must dig a hole on the ground and wait for one of them to get stuck on it. Then you must hit it with your shovel to make it fall.

game.name: Aquatron
game.author: Sierra On-Line
game.description: It's just you and your jet, which can also 'fly' underwater, against massive spawning armadas of aliens. Scrolls at lightspeed and makes you sweat heavily. Cheats: Level skip [Ctrl] + @, Restart [Ctrl] + C or R, Reselect controls: [Ctrl] + I, Turn around instantly: [Ctrl] + T

game.name: Asteroids
game.author: Atari
game.description: Asteroids is a conversion of the popular arcade game. You are the pilot of a spaceship trapped in the asteroid belt, and you need to blast your way out! Each time you shoot one of the asteroids, it will break up into smaller pieces. Eventually the pieces will become small enough that they can be destroyed. When all asteroids have been fully destroyed, you can move on to the next, more difficult round. Just in case the numerous asteroids didn't cause you enough trouble, a pesky flying saucer will appear from time to time and try to shoot your spaceship with torpedoes.

game.name: Autobahn
game.author: Nasir Gebelli / Sirius Software
game.description: A clone of the arcade game Monaco GP, Autobahn is a very simple and fast arcade racer. As you blaze down the roadway you must avoid colliding with other cars and road hazards. You have three speeds you can run your car at and the high score is determined by the number of miles you've driven. Ctrl-P switches to Paddles.

game.name: BallBlazer
game.author: Lucasfilm Games / Epyx
game.description: Ballblazer is a one-on-one soccer match set in the future. You control a robot and try to snare a floating ball called a Plasmorb, which could then be fired or carried into the opponent's goal. You play on a simple 3d playfield which is split in half. You can play against the computer or against another robot controlled by a human player.

game.name: BC's Quest for Tires
game.author: Sydney Development Group / Sierra On-Line
game.description: Cute Chick is in trouble! She is being held captive by the dinosaur, and it is up to Thor to ride his trusty wheel to the rescue. There are many obstacles in the way which Thor will need to jump and duck, including rocks, trees, rivers, lava pits, cliffs, and of course Fat Broad. When you duck, the character bounces up and down, so don't duck too soon.

game.name: Beach Head
game.author: Access Software
game.description: Your mission is to storm the island and recapture it. This takes place over the course of 6 different sequences. The first sequence is Aerial Reconnissance where the fleet must be moved directly past the enemy or into a hidden passage. Optional is this Hidden Passage sequence, where the player will have to manuever around mines and torpedos.

game.name: Fishies
game.author: Jersey Cow Software and Cognetics Corp.
game.description: A virtual fishtank. Known keys that work are "F" and Space bar.

game.name: Jungle Hunt
game.author: Atarisoft
game.description: Jungle Hunt offers four unique adventure experiences, which repeat with greater difficulty once all four have been survived. If you don't survive these adventures, you will not only lose your own life but that of the lovely Penelope, who has been captured by cannibals! (From www.mobygames.com)

game.name: Stellar 7
game.author: Damon Slye / Software Entertainment Company
game.description: In Stellar 7, you drive the Raven, the most advanced Terran fighting vehicle. You are up against Gir Draxon and his evil Arcturan army. You will go from star system to star system, fighting his forces. (From www.mobygames.com)
